verses.roman:
bhakta-bhāva aṅgīkari' hailā avatīrṇa
śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya-rūpe sarva-bhāve pūrṇa

synonyms: bhakta-bhāva—the ecstasy of being a devotee; aṅgīkari'-accepting; hailā—became; avatīrṇa—incarnated; śri-kṛṣṇa-caitanya-rūpe—in the form of Lord Śrī Kṛṣṇa Caitanya; sarva-bhāve pūrṇa—complete in every respect.
translation: Therefore Lord Kṛṣṇa accepted the position of a devotee and descended in the form of Lord Caitanya, who is complete in every respect.
